name: Your Spider
description:
In the town of St. Olympus, Matthew and his friendly pet spider encounter formidable monsters, which do not like humans or spiders. In your journey to escape the nightmare, you will: Confront numerous types of bosses... Play as both Matthew (1st person) and your spider, finding important items and fighting monsters... Drive your spider and work together to defeat the monsters... Find maps to help you explore various premises within St. Olympus... Solve unique puzzles...

Includes:

  • Fully customizable controls
  • Support for a wide-range of controllers
  • Controller vibration/rumbling effects
  • Countless cinematic style cutscenes
